Module kivakit.filesystems.hdfs
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.hdfs

Class HdfsFileSystemService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.hdfs.HdfsFileSystemService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSystemService
    public class HdfsFileSystemService
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSystemService
    Not public API

    Implementation of the FileSystemService SPI to provide HDFS access through the KIVAKIT resource API. This service accepts FilePaths that begin with "hdfs:" and it provides implementations of FileService and FolderService which are used by File and Folder to provide transparent access to file system services, including HDFS.

    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    HdfsFile, HdfsFolder, Resource, File, Folder
